improvement_list.improvement_desc: The code has a potential runtime error. The `hare.successor.successor` access may cause an exception if `hare.successor` is None. Add a check before accessing the successor to avoid this.

The while loop condition is always true because there is no condition to break out of the loop.  The loop should check if hare and tortoise are pointing to the same node to detect the cycle.  The current logic will continue indefinitely causing infinite loop if there is no cycle. Add explicit check for cycle detection.
